name: hLoop
description:
What is going on here?

A short visual story about the loop. Hanging loop. Its life is not easy, but it tries to cope.

The game was made for Black and White Jam #8↷∞ and the theme was 'loop'.

Input

Only your mouse.

Credits

Thanks to these folks for their amazing sounds: alurosu & pooky1

If the game does not work in your browser, you can download the desktop version below.
